article_metadata.title: Medical errors | Miami Herald

og.description: Re Jim Morin’s May 12 medical error cartoon: While physicians do make lethal mistakes, the major causes of medical deaths are hospital acquired infections, falls, medication errors, and early discharge from the hospital.
